Song.title: Come, Christians Join To Sing
Song.copyright: Original Lyrics by Christian Bateman (1843) Verse 3 and Alternate Lyrics by Kevin Hartnett 2006 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [G G/B Am7 D]
Verse 1: [G]Come, Christians, [C/G]join to [D]sing, [G]Alle[C]luia! [D]A[G]men! [G]Loud praise to [C/G]Christ our [D]King, [G]Alle[C]luia! [D]A[G]men! [G/B]Let, all with [C]heart and [D]voice, [G/B]Before His [C]throne re[D]joice, [Em]Praise [Bm]is His [C]gracious [D]choice [G/B]Alle[C]luia! [D]A[G]men![G/B Am7 D]
Verse 2: [G]Come, lift your [C/G]hearts on [D]high, [G]Alle[C]luia! [D]A[G]men! [G]Let praises [C]fill the [D]sky. [G]Alle[C]luia! [D]A[G]men! [G/B]He is our [C]Guide and [D]friend. [G/B]He will His [C]grace ex[D]tend. [Em]His [Bm]love will [C]never [D]end. [G/B]Alle[C]luia! [D]A[G]men![G/B Am7 D]
{new_page} Verse 3: [G]Come praise the [C/G]risen [D]Lamb, [G]Alle[C]luia! [D]A[G]men! [G]He died to [C/G]ransom [D]man. [G]Alle[C]luia! [D]A[G]men! [G/B]On that tri[C]umphant [D]day [G/B]He took our [C]sins a[D]way! [Em]Death [Bm]could not [C]bid him [D]stay [G/B]Alle[C]luia! [D]A[G]men![G/B Am7 D G G/B Am7 Esus E]
Verse 4: [A let ring]Come, let our praise remain, [A]Alle[D]luia! [E]A[A]men! [A let ring]Death shall not end the strain [A]Alle[D]luia! [E]A[A]men! [A/E]On that [D]eternal [E]shore [A/E]His goodness [D]we'll a[E]dore, [F#m]Sing[C#m]ing for[D]ever[E]more, [A/C#]Alle[D]luia! [Esus E]A[A]men! [A/C# Bm7 E A]
